casebody.data:
ROBINS
v.
TOWN OF HILLSBOROUGH. No. 154A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2006. Seth R. Cohen, J. David James, Greensboro, for Robins. J. Michael Carpenter, for NCHBA. Richard A. Zechini, for NCAR. Craig D. Justus, Asheville, for NCOAA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Town of Hillsborough) shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of July 2006."
